result.eng: He loves playing with his ball.
result.ga: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróid
result.orig: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróid
result.html: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróidHe loves playing with his ball.
result.ponchtml: Is breá leis imirt lena liaṫróidHe loves playing with his ball.

result.html: Bhí muid ag imirt cártaíWe were playing cards.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag imirt cártaíWe were playing cards.

result.eng: He likes playing with his toys.
result.ga: Is maith leis súgradh lena chuid bréagán
result.orig: Is maith leis súgradh lena chuid bréagán
result.html: Is maith leis súgradh lena chuid bréagánHe likes playing with his toys.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ leis súgraḋ lena ċuid bréagánHe likes playing with his toys.

result.html: Tá siad ag seinm ceoilThey are playing music.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag seinm ceoilThey are playing music.

result.eng: Oh, Cré na Cille by Máirtín Ó Cadhain is playing there at present.
result.ga: Ó tá Cré na Cille le Máirtín Ó Cadhain ar siúl ann faoi láthair
result.orig: Ó tá Cré na Cille le Máirtín Ó Cadhain ar siúl ann faoi láthair
result.html: Ó tá Cré na Cille le Máirtín Ó Cadhain ar siúl ann faoi láthairOh, Cré na Cille by Máirtín Ó Cadhain is playing there at present.
result.ponchtml: Ó tá Cré na Cille le Máirtín Ó Caḋain ar siúl ann faoi láṫairOh, Cré na Cille by Máirtín Ó Cadhain is playing there at present.

result.eng: And we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ga: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.orig: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.html: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ponchtml: Agus beiḋ muid ag casaḋ sna tiṫe táḃairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireaḋ seaċtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.

result.eng: We are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.orig: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.html: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hochtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a ḃeas ar siúl anoċt ag a hoċtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.

result.eng: I like to read and I love playing music.
result.ga: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh agus is breá liom bheith ag seinm ceoil
result.orig: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh agus is breá liom bheith ag seinm ceoil
result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag léamh agus is breá liom bheith ag seinm ceoilI like to read and I love playing music.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag léaṁ agus is breá liom ḃeiṫ ag seinm ceoilI like to read and I love playing music.

result.eng: Herself and some other neighbourhood kids were playing hide and seek.
result.ga: Bhí sí féin agus páistí eile na comharsanachta ag déanamh na bhfolachán
result.orig: Bhí sí féin agus páistí eile na comharsanachta ag déanamh na bhfolachán

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí féin agus páistí eile na coṁarsanaċta ag déanaṁ na ḃfolaċánHerself and some other neighbourhood kids were playing hide and seek.

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.ponchtml: Aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ga: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
